title: 2+2.5 TH in Beautiful Covina with Spa/Hot Tub + Fireplace
posting_body: ['Welcome to Brookwood Apartments in Covina, CA nestled at the foot of the San Gabriel Mountains, about 20 miles east of Los Angeles, in the heart of the San Gabriel Valley.', "You'll love our proximity to freeways, the\xa0Metrolink\xa0station, Citrus College, and APU.", 'Our Brookwood apartments are infused with natural elements like lush gardens and a relaxing pond.', 'When you stay in one of our amazing apartments for rent at Brookwood,\xa0feel free to relax in the pool and spa, entertain friends in the barbecue areas, work out in the community fitness center, or work or play in our clubhouse.', '\xa0Each of our apartments comes equipped with a private patio or balcony, breakfast bar, ceiling fan, and dishwasher.', 'Select residences also have cozy fireplaces for those cold winter nights.', 'Call today to schedule your personal tour!', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Disposal', '- Refrigerator Available', '- Breakfast Bar', '- Central Air*', '- Fireplace*', '- Dishwasher', '- Private Balconies and Patios', '* With Select Apartment Homes', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Public Parks Nearby', '- Close to the Metro', '- Multiple Water Features', '- Soothing Spa/Hot Tub', '- Fitness Center', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Lush Landscaping', '- BBQ/Picnic Area', '- Swimming Pool', '- Clubhouse', '- Covered Parking', 'PET-FRIENDLY', 'Cats Allowed.', 'Additional Fees and Deposit May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'Interested in living here?', 'We would love to hear from you!', 'Get in touch with one of our community specialists who can help you find the perfect home!', '<URL>', 'For appointment or for questions, call today at', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at <URL>/', '18537 Arrow Highway', 'Covina, CA 91722', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.', 'Interior photos may not be of exact unit.']
